name: queryLogShippingConfigurations
description: Retrieves all log shipping configuration objects. Results can be filtered and sorted.

primary_database_id.description: ID of a primary database object.

primary_database_name.description: Filter log shipping configuration objects by performing an infix search using the name of a primary database.

secondary_database_name.description: Filter log shipping configuration objects by performing an infix search using the name of a secondary database.

location.description: Filter log shipping configuration objects by performing an infix search using the location string value (host/instance) for a secondary database.

status.description: Filter log shipping configuration objects based on the status value for the secondary database.

limit.description: Limit the summary information to a specified maximum number of results.

offset.description: Starting position in the list of results contained in the response. The summary information includes the specified numbered result and all higher numbered results.

sort_by.description: Specifies an attribute used to ASCII-sort the results. Sorting by the last_applied attribute represents the timestamp as an ISO 8601-encoded string.

sort_order.description: Sort order, either ascending or descending.
